title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building autonomous AI at scale with Amazon Bedrock (AIM390)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock 大规模构建自主 AI (AIM390)
abstract: Building autonomous AI at scale with Amazon Bedrock	2025 marks the breakthrough year for autonomous AI systems, from vibe coding to specialized assistants and super agents disrupting multi-billion dollar industries. Amazon Bedrock empowers disruptive startups to rapidly prototype autonomous applications and agents, seamlessly scaling from proof-of-concept to production systems serving millions of users. We'll tackle top scaling challenges, share best practices, and hear from Genspark, a cutting-edge super agent startup, showcasing their complete journey—from rapid MVP development to handling production traffic at scale. Discover specific Bedrock capabilities and support programs that optimize performance, reduce cost, achieve global scalability, and enable your vision without enterprise-level infrastructure investments.
abstract_cn: 使用 Amazon Bedrock 大规模构建自主 AI2025 年标志着自主 AI 系统的突破之年，从氛围编码到专业助手和颠覆数十亿美元产业的超级代理。Amazon Bedrock 赋能颠覆性初创企业快速原型化自主应用程序和代理，无缝扩展从概念验证到服务数百万用户的生产系统。我们将解决主要扩展挑战，分享最佳实践，并听取 Genspark（一家前沿超级代理初创公司）的经验，展示他们的完整旅程——从快速 MVP 开发到大规模处理生产流量。了解特定的 Bedrock 功能和支持计划，这些功能可优化性能、降低成本、实现全球可扩展性，并在无需企业级基础设施投资的情况下实现您的愿景。
